code: import React,{useRef}from"react";import{API_OPTIONS}from"../../services/urlsservice";import{useDispatch}from"react-redux";import{addSearchMovies}from"../../utils/store/gptSlice";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const GptSearchBar=()=>{let reference=useRef(null);let dispatch=useDispatch();async function handleGptSearch(){const movieResponse=await fetch(`https://api.themoviedb.org/3/search/movie?&query=${reference.current.value}&include_adult=false&language=en-US&page=1`,API_OPTIONS);const movies=await movieResponse.json();dispatch(addSearchMovies(movies));}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"h-40 pt-20",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex items-center w-1/3  min-w-72 mx-auto bg-gray-100 rounded-full px-2 py-1 shadow-md",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{ref:reference,type:"text",placeholder:"Search for a movie",className:"flex-grow bg-transparent outline-none text-sm text-gray-800 placeholder-gray-500"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"ml-2 bg-black text-white px-2 py-1 rounded-full hover:bg-black hover:bg-opacity-80 transition",onClick:handleGptSearch,children:"Search"})]})});};export default GptSearchBar;
